div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1844 Saharanpur, c. 150 km. N of New (880) Delhi, India, before 1850 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 600+ AR Menander Apollodotus I Strato I Antimachus II Antialcidas Disposition: E. Thomas 200 Prinsep, Essays on Indian Antiquities 1 (London, 1858), p. 208, note 1
